Flowstream

A school project where the teacher was the client and created an imginary product and company. From this I was aksed to create a full stack website written in React as frontend and an Express based backend API to handle the users and other data forms on the site.

Thesis: Linux vs Windows

My thesis (gymnasiearbete) about performace diffirences between Manjaro Linux and Windows 10. The analasys details diffirences between the two operating systems and their diffirence in performance. We detail the performance by benchmarking the two operating systems with a program written in Rust.

Other projects I've worked on

Cache api

A caching GraphQl/Express Api that fetches from reddit and returns a single post to the client. The api is very efficient and makes working with content based applications a breeze because all you need is on GET request.

CourseBot

CourseBot is a Discord bot written in Typescirpt the discord.js library and the Discord Akairo framework. The bot was created to ease the worlflow for moderators in diffirent Discord guilds. It can do anything moderating related and more!

Api client

To make fetching from my cache api even easier, I've made an Typescript based npm module that anyone can use. It can get anything from my cache api and it's also configurable so that in case you're selfhosting the cache api you can point it there.
